trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemDataBind"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示处理的方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemDataBind"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> control contains a collection of items.
These items are of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> class.

When providing default rendering, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> control represents a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> object using its <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 提供默认呈现时<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>控件表示<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>对象使用其<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>

trans-unit.source: In templated rendering, the template can render any desired property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> object or associated data-bound object.
trans-unit.target: 在模板化呈现时，模板可以呈现的任何所需的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>对象或关联的数据绑定对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>

trans-unit.source: When you create a ListDataBindEventHandler delegate for a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> control, you identify the method that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建的 ListDataBindEventHandler 委托<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>控件，需要标识处理事件的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> control notifies the handler when an item event is generated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>控件生成项事件时通知该处理程序。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时都会调用事件处理程序。
